src:
黴菌耐高溫 不小心吃進黴菌怎麼辦（視頻）

07 Nov 2019, 03:34

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】幾乎所有出現在你家裡的黴菌，都是不好的，如果不小心吃進黴菌怎麼辦？…
時間點：好的黴菌真的存在嗎 1:10醬油沒錯，裡面有黴菌！ ? 2:43莎樂美腸 3:05檸檬酸 3:20若你吃了發黴的食物會怎麼樣呢？ 3:38哪一些產品你需要立刻丟棄 5:44要是壞了就別買 7:33
以下YouTube視頻示範：

text:
Mold heat resistance How to do if you accidentally eat mold (video)

07 Nov 2019, 03:34

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] Almost all the molds that appear in your home are not good. What if you accidentally eat mold? ...
Time: Is good mold really there? 1:10 Soy sauce is right, there is mold inside! 2:43 Salome 3:05 Citric acid 3:20 What if you eat moldy food? 3:38 Which products you need to discard immediately 5:44 If you are broken, don't buy 7:33
